name: suitjs-servant
description: Optimize your heavy work with a Servant's help.
author: Eduardo Dias da Costa  <eduardo@thelaborat.org> https://github.com/eduardo-costa

scripts.init: npm install -g uglifyjs && npm install -g http-server
scripts.build-js: uglifyjs js/servant.doc.js -b -o js/servant.js && uglifyjs js/servant.doc.js -o js/servant.min.js
